compliant.section: Confidentiality of proprietary and confidential information
compliant.legal provisions: Protection of confidential information and trade secrets
Use of information solely for specified purposes

compliant.section: Disclosure to employees with a need to know

non_compliant.section: No obligation to protect non-confidential information
non_compliant.legal provisions: Rights of individuals regarding their personal data
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the handling of personal data and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

non_compliant.section: No alteration or reverse engineering of confidential information
non_compliant.legal provisions: Rights to access and modify personal data
non_compliant.amend: Ensure that users have rights to access and request modifications to their personal data.
